attributes.action: Review politicians expense procedure and claims scrutinised by the taxman.
attributes.background: There is public concern about the amount of money politicians are claiming, what they are claiming for and possible tax evasion. This needs to be reviewed independently and all politicians financial affairs be audited by the customs and excise. All politicians tax returns must be published online.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
